topic.title: General Practitioner with an Extended Role
topic.shortdesc: A General Practitioner with an Extended Role (GPwER) is a GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTITIONER who undertakes, in addition to their core general practice, a role that is beyond the scope of GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTITIONER training and membership of the Royal College of General Practitioners and requires further training.

othermeta.name: name
othermeta.content: General Practitioner with an Extended Role
